name: Christmas Copter Crisis
description:
Put the sled away, and grab the copter! Two billion children await their pressies, and a host of fiendish enemies stand in your way, Father Christmas.

 The rival holidays; Easter, Halloween, and others are attempting to knock us off the top holiday spot. Not acceptable! Load up the snowball cannon, and let's get those presents delivered.

* I don't currently have the means to add proper localization to this game, I did, to the best of my abilities, add a French and a German translation, er.. I did my best:)
